Title: Golf Mad
Notes: Silent film about a man who gets the golfing craze and wreaks havoc with clubs

Title: Golf
Notes: A golfer digs holes in his floor and plays indoors , smashing mirrors and vases

Title: West of Broadway
Notes: Silent film about Wyoming rancher who sets out to attract tourists to his golf club/resort

Title: Spring Fever
Notes: Silent film about a golfer who hopes to marry a rich girl ( Joan Crawford )

Title: Love in the Rough
Notes: A sound remake of Spring Fever , with Robert Montgomery and songs

Title: The Golf Specialist
Notes: W. C. Fields short subject in which he gives lessons on the game

Title: Part Time Wife
Notes: A man who loses his golf-loving spouse learns the game so he can play her

Title: Follow Thru
Notes: A club champion competes with her rival over their handsome instructor

Title: Follow the Sun
Notes: Story of success and adversity of Ben Hogan , played by Glenn Ford

Title: Pat and Mike
Notes: Spencer Tracy as the new trainer of a great female athlete ( Katharine Hepburn )

Title: The Caddy
Notes: Martin and Lewis golf comedy

Title: Banning
Notes: A PGA pro ( Robert Wagner ) banned for cheating gets into debt and a dangerous match

Title: Once You Kiss a Stranger
Notes: A pro golfer is menaced by a deranged woman who murders his rival

Title: Babe
Notes: TV film on life of Babe Didrikson Zaharias , starring Susan Clark and Alex Karras

Title: Caddyshack
Notes: Manic antics at Bushwood Country Club , starring Bill Murray , Chevy Chase and Rodney Dangerfield

Title: Dorf on Golf
Notes: Direct-to-video short film . First entry in Dorf series with Tim Conway

Title: Caddyshack II
Notes: Sequel to 1980 hit , with Jackie Mason as an insulted guest who decides to buy Bushwood

Title: Dead Solid Perfect
Notes: Made for TV , based on Dan Jenkins novel

Title: Dorf 's Golf Bible
Notes: Direct-to-video short film ; second in the Dorf series

Title: Den ofrivillige golfaren
Notes: Swedish film
